Name: sna-abdullahjmadini
Author: Abdullah J. M. Adini And Students

Translations.Text: “Tenzi vedu! Tinotenda pane izvo zvamatumira pasi, uye tinotevedzera mutumwa (Jesu), saka tinyorei pasi pakati pevapupuri.”
Uye vakaronga (vasingatendi kuti vauraye Jesu), uye Allah vakarongawo. Asi Allah ndivo murongi anogonesesa pakati pevarongi vese

(Rangarirai) apo Allah vakati: “Iwe Isa (Jesu)! Zvirokwazvo, ndichaita kuti urare uye ndova ndokutakura wouya kwandiri, uye ndova ndinokuchenura kubva kune avo vasingatendi (manyepo avo ekuti Jesu ndimwanakomana waAllah), uye ndichaita kuti avo vanokutevera (vanotenda muhumwechete hwaAllah) vave pamusoro peavo vasingatendi kusvika zuva rekumutswa. Uye muchava munodzoka kwandiri uye ndichatonga pakati penyu pane izvo maipokana.”
“Kune avo vasingatendi, ndichavarwadzisa nemarwadzo akanyanya pano pasi uye nekudenga, uye vachashaya vabatsiri.”
Uye kune avo vanotenda (muhumwechete hwaAllah) nekuita mabasa akanaka, (Allah) vachavapa muripo wavo zvizere. Uye Allah havadi avo vanoita mabasa akaipa
Izvi ndizvo zvatiri kuverenga kwauri (Muhammad (SAW)) kubva muzviratidzo uye neyeuchidzo ine hungwaru (Qur’aan)
Zvirokwazvo, mufananidzo waIsa (Jesu) kuna Allah wakafanana nemufananidzo waAdam. Vakamusika kubva kuvhu (Adam) vakati kwaari: “Ivapo!” uye akabva avapo
Ichi ndicho chokwadi kubva kuna Tenzi vako, nokudaro usava pakati peavo vanopokana nacho

Avo vanopokana newe maererano naye (Jesu) mushure mekunge ruzivo rwauya kwauri (kuti Jesu muranda waAllah), vaudze kuti: “Ngatidanei vanakomana vedu nevanakomana venyu, madzimai edu nemadzimai enyu, isusu nemi, tonamata uye tokumbira kuti kurengera kwaAllah kuve kune avo vanonyepa.”
